name: Get on my Wavelength!
description:
Note: The current build of this game is heavily incomplete. There is more content, and better assets to come, but we've uploaded what was available at the end of PegJam 2023. We'll publish a release build once it's ready.

The beachfront town of Waverley is having a handful of conundrums affecting its citizens. Only you, as a muse of inspiration, can help them solve their issues and bring them the guidance and fulfillment they deserve!

Puzzle game made during PegJam 2023. Theme was "Waves"!

The goal of the game is to seek out "concepts" strewn all over the place and in turn use those "concepts" to aid in guiding the citizens suffering a crisis of conscience. Successfully doing so will allow them to complete their tasks!

Controls (Keyboard) - Movement: Arrow Keys Confirm/Select: Z, Enter, Space Dash: Shift

Controls (Mouse) - Movement/Confirm/Select: Left-click

Controls (XBox Controller) - Movement: D-pad/Analog Confirm/Select: A-button

Artist / Level & Sound Design - Shera Starr (https://hachyderm.io/@anocturnaldream)

Scripting / Events & Game Design - Josh Grand (https://mstdn.games/@faelim)

Credits section currently in-progress!
